mapper.select: SELECT a.EMPLYR_ID, b.USER_NM as USER_NM FROM COMTNCMMNTYUSER a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.EMPLYR_ID = b.ESNTL_ID WHERE a.CMMNTY_ID = #{cmmntyId} AND a.USE_AT = 'Y' AND a.MNGR_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNCMMNTYUSER (CMMNTY_ID, EMPLYR_ID, MNGR_AT, SBSCRB_DE, MBER_STTUS, USE_AT, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, FRST_REGISTER_ID) VALUES (#{cmmntyId}, #{emplyrId}, #{mngrAt}, NOW(), #{mberSttus}, #{useAt}, NOW(), #{frstRegisterId})

SELECT a.CMMNTY_ID , a.EMPLYR_ID , b.USER_NM AS EMPLYR_NM , b.USER_ID , b.USER_EMAIL , a.MNGR_AT , a.SBSCRB_DE , a.SECSN_DE , a.MBER_STTUS , c.CODE_NM AS MBER_STTUS_NM , a.USE_AT , a.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , a.FRST_REGISTER_ID FROM COMTNCMMNTYUSER a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMVNUSERMASTER b ON a.EMPLYR_ID = b.ESNTL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE_ID, CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM013' AND USE_AT='Y') c ON a.MBER_STTUS = c.CODE WHERE 1=1 AND a.CMMNTY_ID = #{cmmntyId} AND b.USER_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchWrd},'%')
ORDER BY b.USER_NM LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
